overview: Wajdi is confused about the three girls who claim to love him without knowing about his morals. He is a wealthy person looking for a girl who wants him for himself. InSaf meets and is shocked that her rich father is very stingy, the father conspires to marry his youngest daughter from a neighbor, to marry Scrooge from the daughter of the neighbor. Wajdi pretends to be a driver and works for the father.
title: القرش الأبيض
